1.1.0.name: wordpress/mhr-custom-anti-copy
1.1.0.description: This plugin allows you to disable right click and word selection on posts or pages. MHR Anti Copy comes with flexible custom settings. You can protect a single page/post or overall pages. Everything can be done with a few simple steps. With shotcodes you can protect a single page or post easily.
